name: Cadastra Package Manager Acompanhamento de Volumetria

data.description: Template padrão para email de alerta de consumo da LP de Acompanhamento de Volumetria CLIENTE.
data.name: 20250714_Alerta_Volumetria_cad

i6vi2o5eg3j.content:
Alerta CLIENTE - Acompanhamento de Volumetria
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

🚨 Alerta de limite atingido

A cloudpage de Acompanhamento de Volumetria retornou um limite de 70% ou mais de serviço consumido para %%=v(@servicos)=%%.

Recomendamos que você tome as ações necessárias para avaliar e gerenciar o consumo apresentado.
Acessar Cloudpage

As informações recebidas neste email são referentes aos dados apresentados na Cloudpage de Acompanhamento de Volumetria do(a) CLIENTE. Por favor, não responda este email.

Você pode acessar a cloudpage através do link abaixo:

Clique aqui

This email was sent by: %%Member_Busname%%
%%Member_Addr%% %%Member_City%%, %%Member_State%%, %%Member_PostalCode%%, %%Member_Country%%

Update Profile

qfhh4f0n12l.content:
%%[


SET @rows = LookupRows("{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/c0268666-2d6e-f011-a5dd-d4f5ef66b0c7/data/name}}", "Ano", "2025") 

IF RowCount(@rows) > 0 THEN

/* Setar o total contratado para cada servico */
SET @contratadoSuper = 00000000
SET @contratadoSMS = 000000
SET @contratadoWhats = 000000
SET @contratadoContatos = 000000

SET @row = Row(@rows, 1)
SET @consumidoSupermessages = Field(@row, "totalSupermessages")
SET @taxaSupermessages = FormatNumber(Multiply(Divide(@consumidoSupermessages, @contratadoSuper), 100), "N2")
SET @consumidoSMS = Field(@row, "totalSMS")
SET @taxaSMS = FormatNumber(Multiply(Divide(@consumidoSMS, @contratadoSMS), 100), "N2")
SET @consumidoWhats = Field(@row, "totalWhatsapp")
SET @taxaWhats = FormatNumber(Multiply(Divide(@consumidoWhats, @contratadoWhats), 100), "N2")
SET @consumidoContatos = Field(@row, "totalContatos")
SET @taxaContatos = FormatNumber(Multiply(Divide(@consumidoContatos, @contratadoContatos), 100), "N2")

SET @servicos = ""

    IF @taxaSupermessages >= 70  THEN 
    SET @servicos=CONCAT(@servicos, "Supermessages," ) 
    ENDIF 
    IF @taxaSMS >= 70  THEN 
    SET @servicos=CONCAT(@servicos, "SMS, " ) 
    ENDIF 
    IF @taxaWhats > 70  THEN 
    SET @servicos=CONCAT(@servicos, "Whatsapp, " ) 
    ENDIF
    IF @taxaContatos > 70  THEN
    SET @servicos=CONCAT(@servicos, "Contatos" ) 
    ENDIF

    /* Remover a última vírgula se existir */
    SET @servicosLength = Length(@servicos)

    IF @servicosLength > 0 THEN
    SET @servicos = Substring(@servicos, 1, Subtract(@servicosLength, 1))
    ENDIF
    
    ENDIF

]%%

data.dataExtractTypeName: Enhanced FTP File Move and Copy
data.name: File Transfer Volumetria Cloudpages
Query Volumetria SMS
data.queryText:
SELECT 
  CONCAT(YEAR(ActionDateTime), '-',MONTH(ActionDateTime), '- 01') AS MesAno,
  COUNT(*) * 12.88 AS qtdSMS
FROM _SMSMessageTracking
WHERE
  YEAR(ActionDateTime) = 2025 OR 
  YEAR(ActionDateTime) = 2026 
GROUP BY 
  YEAR(ActionDateTime),
  MONTH(ActionDateTime)

data.name: Query Volumetria Total
data.queryText:
SELECT 
    YEAR(GETDATE()) AS Ano,
    contatos.totalContatos,
    volumetria.totalSMS,
    volumetria.totalSupermessages + cloudpages.totalImpressions AS totalSupermessages,
    volumetria.totalWhatsapp
FROM 
(
    SELECT 
        COUNT(*) AS totalContatos
    FROM {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/bf1b2d57-9d74-f011-a5dd-d4f5ef66b0c7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/bf1b2d57-9d74-f011-a5dd-d4f5ef66b0c7/data/name}}]
) AS contatos
CROSS JOIN 
(
    SELECT
        SUM(qtdSMS) AS totalSMS,
        SUM(qtdSupermessages) AS totalSupermessages,
        SUM(qtdWhatsapp) AS totalWhatsapp
    FROM {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/c1268666-2d6e-f011-a5dd-d4f5ef66b0c7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/c1268666-2d6e-f011-a5dd-d4f5ef66b0c7/data/name}}]
) AS volumetria
CROSS JOIN
(
    SELECT 
        SUM(Impressions) AS totalImpressions
    FROM {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/bd268666-2d6e-f011-a5dd-d4f5ef66b0c7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/bd268666-2d6e-f011-a5dd-d4f5ef66b0c7/data/name}}]
) AS cloudpages

data.name: Query Volumetria Supermessages
data.queryText:
SELECT 
  CONCAT(YEAR(EventDate), '-', MONTH(EventDate), '-01') AS MesAno,
  COUNT(*) AS qtdSupermessages
FROM _Sent
WHERE 
  YEAR(EventDate) = 2025 OR 
  YEAR(EventDate) = 2026 
GROUP BY 
  YEAR(EventDate),
  MONTH(EventDate)

data.name: Script Volumetria Whatsapp
Trigger Email Automation
data.script:
<script runat="server">
Platform.Load("core", "1.1.1");
try {

    //Seta automação para trigger

    var automationCustomerKey = "AUTOMATION_CUSTOMER_KEY"; //Substitua pela Customer Key da Automacao de Email de Alerta criada. 

    var rr = Platform.Function.CreateObject("RetrieveRequest");

    Platform.Function.SetObjectProperty(rr, "ObjectType", "Automation");
    Platform.Function.AddObjectArrayItem(rr, "Properties", "ProgramID");
    Platform.Function.AddObjectArrayItem(rr, "Properties", "CustomerKey");
    Platform.Function.AddObjectArrayItem(rr, "Properties", "Status");

    var sfp = Platform.Function.CreateObject("SimpleFilterPart");
    Platform.Function.SetObjectProperty(sfp, "Property", "CustomerKey");
    Platform.Function.SetObjectProperty(sfp, "SimpleOperator", "equals");
    Platform.Function.AddObjectArrayItem(sfp, "Value", automationCustomerKey);

    Platform.Function.SetObjectProperty(rr, "Filter", sfp);

    var retrieveStatus = [0, 0, 0];

    var automationResultSet = Platform.Function.InvokeRetrieve(rr, retrieveStatus);

    var ObjectID = automationResultSet[0]["ObjectID"];
    var Status = automationResultSet[0]["Status"];


    var obj = Platform.Function.CreateObject("Automation");
    Platform.Function.SetObjectProperty(obj, "ObjectID", ObjectID);
    var po = Platform.Function.CreateObject("PerformOptions");

    var performResult = [0, 0, 0];


    // Recupera volumetria atual da Data Extension DE_Volumetria_Total
    var customerKey = "DE_VOLUMETRIA_TOTAL_CUSTOMER_KEY"; //Substitua pela Customer Key da DE_Volumetria_Total
    var de = DataExtension.Init(customerKey);

    // Consulta o registro onde o ano é 2025
    var registros = de.Rows.Retrieve({
        Property: "Ano",
        SimpleOperator: "equals",
        Value: "2025"
    });

    // Busca Data atual
    var currentDate = new Date();


    //Substitua pelos valores totais de contrato fornecidos pelo analista
    var totalContratado = {
        Supermessages: 00000000,
        SMS: 0000000,
        Whatsapp: 000000,
        Contatos: 000000
    }


    // Recupera o total consumido atual e data de envio de ultimo email enviado
    var consumidoSupermessages = parseFloat(registros[0].totalSupermessages);
    var consumidoSMS = parseFloat(registros[0].totalSMS);
    var consumidoWhatsapp = parseFloat(registros[0].totalWhatsapp);
    var consumidoContatos = parseFloat(registros[0].totalContatos);
    var lastEmailSent = registros[0].lastEmailSent;

    //Cálculo de taxas
    var percentualSuper = (consumidoSupermessages / parseFloat(totalContratado.Supermessages)) * 100;
    var percentualSMS = (consumidoSMS / parseFloat(totalContratado.SMS)) * 100;
    var percentualWhats = (consumidoWhatsapp / parseFloat(totalContratado.Whatsapp)) * 100;
    var percentualContatos = (consumidoContatos / parseFloat(totalContratado.Contatos)) * 100;

    //Verifica se um email já foi enviado

    if (!lastEmailSent) {

        // Verificar se o total consumido é maior que o contratado
        if (percentualSuper >= 70 || percentualSMS >= 70 || percentualWhats >= 70 || percentualContatos >= 70) {

            // Ativa automação de envio de email de alerta
            var performStatus = Platform.Function.InvokePerform(obj, "start", performResult, po);

            //Atualiza campo com data do envio de email
            var updateEmailData = de.Rows.Update(
                {
                    lastEmailSent: currentDate
                },
                ['Ano'],
                ['2025']
            )

            Write('Alerta enviado!')

        } else {
            Write("Nenhuma taxa excedeu o limite. Alerta não enviado.");
        }
    } else {
        Write("Email de alerta já enviado!")
    }

} catch (error) {
    // Capturar e exibir erros
    Write("Erro ao ativar a automação: " + Stringify(error));
}
</script>
